name: Nature`s Secrets Aloe 94% Gel
description: Nature Secret Aloe 94% Skin soothing Gel,The freshest & purest Aloe Vera product in Sri Lanka, and one of the purest in the world. 94% of the product is made of fresh Aloe Vera gel directly taken from the sap (not freeze dried).. This multi-purpose product is ideal as a daily, cooling moisturiser and is also recommended for sun burns, minor burns, soothing skin after hair removal and shaving, treating pimples and acne, insect bites and nappy rash. Also helps prevents dandruff and loss of hair. *Images for illustration purposes only. Product received may vary.
